tourBios.curYrHigh: t the eighth tournament of the year. Finished at 5-under in the 36-hole tournament, six strokes shy of winner Songgyu Yoo.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Finished 46th on the final Order of Merit. Earned conditional PGA TOUR China Series' status by finishing T16 at the Second Global Qualifying Tournament at CTS Tycoon's D&Y Course in Shenzhen in February…Claimed his first top-10 when he T10 at The Eternal Courtyard Open in May in Zhengzhou...Just missed another top-10 in May when he T13 at the Lanhai Open, with three of his four rounds at par or better…On the Korean Challenge Tour, enjoyed a T5 at the second tournament of the campaign. At the 36-hole event, shot rounds of 72-69 to finish at 3-under, four shots behind winner Jinho Kim…In July, added an additional top-10, a

2014: On the Korean Tour, made one cut in three starts. Used opening rounds of 71-69-68 at the Happiness Songhak Construction Open to finish T45. A final-round 75 prevented him from moving up the leaderboard.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T10th in 2015 at the The Eternal Courtyard Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T53rd in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
